inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Eigentum: Pina. E 8 | URC of sheet in black ink, on verso: 30. | LRC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2329

signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 16 | LL in pencil, below image: Der Gasometer. / No 5.
title: Gasometer
